SocialContributionSum.name: SocialContributionSum
SocialContributionSum.description: Represents information about social contributions made to political and non-political organizations belonging to financial and non-financial categories.

Category.description: Specifies the category of social contribution.

ContribOrganizationName.description: The name of the organization making the social contribution.

Country.description: Specifies the country where the recipient is located.

Description.description: The description of the social contribution statistics.

DisclsReportingPeriodId.description: The reporting period for which the social contribution statistics are generated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

NonMonetaryCtrbType.description: Specifies the type of non-monetary contribution.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

RecipientName.description: The name of the contribution recipient.

SubsidiaryAccountId.description: The account that's identified as a subsidiary company.

Subtype.description: Specifies the subtype of the financial and in-kind political contributions made directly and indirectly by the company.

TotalAmount.description: The total amount of the social contribution.

Type.description: Specifies the type of social contribution.
